text: Yithani, “Thina sikholwa kuAllâh, nakoko kuthunyelwe kuthi nakoko kwathunyelwa kuIbrâhîm, kuIsmâ’îl, kuIs- hâ’k, kuYa’kûb nakwizizwe55 nakoko kwatyhilwa kuMûsâ naku’Isâ nakoko kwanikwa abaProfeti kuvela eNkosini yabo. Asenzi mahluko phakathi komnye nomnye kubo. Kananjalo thina sizinikela kuYe [uAllâh (singamaMuslim]
